answerText: Pygmalion[10] This Shaw comedy is about an illicit romance between Raina Petkoff, who is engaged to Sergius Saranoff, and the chocolate hoarding Captain Bluntschli.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 15 | 7 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This play begins in Covent Garden where the central characters meet and a bet is made by Colonel Pickering. For 10 points each: [10] Eliza Doolittle is supposed to be transformed into a sophisticated lady by Henry Higgins in this play by George Bernard Shaw.
